prompts.title: Write an Engaging Blog Post on {{topic}}
prompts.content: Compose a detailed and informative blog post on the topic of {{topic}}, aimed at {{audience}}. Ensure the content is structured with an introduction, body, and conclusion, and includes actionable insights.
prompts.description: Creates a comprehensive blog post tailored to a specific audience.

variables.name: topic
variables.description: The subject matter of the blog post

variables.name: audience
variables.description: The target readership of the blog post

prompts.title: Craft a Persuasive Product Description for {{product}}
prompts.content: Write a compelling product description for {{product}} that highlights its key features and benefits. The description should appeal to {{customer_segment}} and encourage them to make a purchase.
prompts.description: Generates a persuasive product description targeting specific customers.

variables.name: product
variables.description: The name and type of the product

variables.name: customer_segment
variables.description: The specific group of customers targeted

prompts.title: Develop an Informative Newsletter on {{subject}}
prompts.content: Create a newsletter covering the latest updates and insights on {{subject}}. The content should be informative and engaging for subscribers interested in {{interest_area}}.
prompts.description: Produces content for a newsletter focused on a specific subject.

variables.name: subject
variables.description: The main topic of the newsletter

variables.name: interest_area
variables.description: The area of interest for the subscribers

prompts.title: Create an Engaging Social Media Post for {{platform}}
prompts.content: Draft an engaging and shareable social media post suitable for {{platform}} about {{topic}}. Include a compelling call-to-action and relevant hashtags.
prompts.description: Helps generate social media content tailored to a specific platform.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: The social media platform for the post

variables.name: topic
variables.description: The main subject of the social media post

prompts.title: Compose an Informative White Paper on {{subject}}
prompts.content: Write a detailed white paper on {{subject}} that provides in-depth analysis and valuable insights. The content should be well-researched and suitable for industry professionals.
prompts.description: Creates a comprehensive white paper for professional audiences.

variables.name: subject
variables.description: The topic of the white paper
variables.example: Blockchain technology in supply chain management

prompts.title: Draft a Press Release Announcing {{event}}
prompts.content: Create a press release announcing {{event}}. Include key details such as the who, what, when, where, and why, and ensure the tone is professional and newsworthy.
prompts.description: Generates a press release for a specific event or announcement.

variables.name: event
variables.description: The event or news to announce
variables.example: The opening of a new company headquarters

prompts.title: Write a Captivating Story for {{genre}}
prompts.content: Craft a short story in the {{genre}} genre that revolves around {{main_character}} and the theme of {{theme}}. Ensure the narrative is engaging with a clear beginning, middle, and end.
prompts.description: Helps in writing a short story with specified elements.

variables.name: genre
variables.description: The genre of the story

variables.name: main_character
variables.description: The protagonist of the story

variables.name: theme
variables.description: The central theme of the story

prompts.title: Develop a Script for a {{format}} on {{topic}}
prompts.content: Write a script for a {{format}} about {{topic}}. The script should include dialogue, scene descriptions, and any necessary directions for actors or presenters.
prompts.description: Creates a script for various formats like videos or podcasts.

variables.name: format
variables.description: The format of the script

variables.name: topic
variables.description: The subject of the script
variables.example: The impact of social media on society

prompts.title: Compose an Effective Email Campaign for {{purpose}}
prompts.content: Draft an email campaign consisting of {{number_of_emails}} emails aimed at {{purpose}}. Ensure each email has a clear message, call-to-action, and is tailored to {{audience}}.
prompts.description: Generates content for an email marketing campaign.

variables.name: purpose
variables.description: The goal of the email campaign

variables.name: number_of_emails
variables.description: The number of emails in the campaign

variables.name: audience
variables.description: The target audience for the emails

prompts.title: Generate FAQs for {{product_or_service}}
prompts.content: Create a list of frequently asked questions and answers for {{product_or_service}} to assist customers with common inquiries.
prompts.description: Produces a helpful FAQ section for customers.

variables.name: product_or_service
variables.description: The product or service the FAQs are about

prompts.content: Compose a step-by-step how-to guide explaining {{process}}. Include clear instructions, tips, and any necessary warnings to assist readers in completing the task successfully.
prompts.description: Creates instructional content to guide readers through a process.

variables.name: process
variables.description: The process or task to be explained

prompts.title: Develop a Company Mission Statement for {{company_name}}

variables.name: industry_or_community
